content:
Are you interested in learning more about
the January 2019 HL7 C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon (C-CDA IAT)?

Expand your expertise and gain more experience with:
• Encounter Summary Documents and Patient Summary Documents
• Data Provenance
• Care Plan Documents
• USCDI (US Core Data for Interoperability)
• C-CDA Scorecard Rubric
• C-CDA on FHIR Documents

Preparation Workshop Call Information (November 14-January 9th):
Wednesdays, 2:00-3:00pm ET
Join the Meeting: https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/305699981
You can also dial in using your phone.
United States: +1 (646) 749-3112 Access Code: 305-699-981

FHIR Connectathon/C-CDA IAT Registration Info Included Below:
Note, you don’t have to be registered for the January C-CDA IAT to attend the Preparation Workshops. But sign up soon, space is limited.

Visit HL7 Confluence for more information:
Complete Preparation Workshop schedule: 20190112-13 C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon
